column4: hi all ubuntu is installed on the laptop now i need the wireless to work can anyone help sudo said go in here an id get help
what is the wireless card built into it?
what kind of wireless card is it?
hold on a moment i'll do some researching
did you get the card?i got
are you able to connect ubuntu to the net via wired connection for right now?
can you download and save files to move to your computer?
there's not much i can do then at this point

find some way of saving files or else, paste these addresses to an email to yourself and get them later     http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/n/ndiswrapper-1.1/ndiswrapper-utils_1.1-5_all.deb        http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/n/ndisgtk/ndisgtk_0.6-0ubuntu1_all.deb
ndiswrapper is a utility for using windows wireless card drivers in linux
but you still need to download and install the ndiswrapper debs in ubuntu
find a friend or someone else with a pc of their own there... they are small files  perhaps you could bribe them with a cappuccino
maybe make a friend while you're at it
hold on... will check file sizes
